name: Rock, Paper, Shoot!
description:
Hello and welcome to my game page!

Im a beginner programmer, and this is the first game i have ever made on my own. It is made for the weekly GameJam #154, and im very proud of the product. The theme was Rock, Paper, Scissors. 

I have made a tutorial option in the game menu, so that you can learn the controls.

It would mean a lot if you could rate the game and maybe leave some feedback for my next GameJam!

Hope you enjoy!
